name: FlyBird 2
description:
A point and click adventure game.

(If you are reading this, leave a comment down below, knowing people are playing makes me have all the feels you know)

Flybird, the goblin, has been tasked with stealing the TIME CRYSTAL for the DARK LORD.  She is the only one willing to do it and the fate of the world falls into her tiny hands. Her tiny, malicious intended hands. 

In this second outing for Flybrid she is sent back to the start of the week, with her memory erased. Can she break out of the loop and realise what is going on. 

Right mouse to pick cycle through your actions and Left Mouse to commit to your action

Download the walkthrough below
